newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's wholesale prices rise 0.15 pct in March.
newsitem.headline: Peru's wholesale prices rise 0.15 pct in March.

text.p: Peru's wholesale prices rose 0.15 percent in March, down from 0.60 percent in the same month last year and from 0.01 percent in February, the government said Tuesday.
In the first three months of 1997, wholesale prices rose 0.54 percent, down from 3.1 percent in the same period last year, the state's National Institute of Statistics and Information (INEI) said.
In 1996, accumulated inflation for wholesale prices was 11.4 percent, up from 8.80 percent the previous year.
